summary: AI career guidance platform named VidyaMitra - React + Vite frontend with authentication, resume upload, job roadmap generator, quiz system, progress tracking, and voice-based mock interview. Uses custom color palette and plain CSS.
architectural_notes: React + Vite frontend structure: components, pages, services, routes, context, styles
React hooks for state management (no complex state libraries)
Color palette: primary #1e3a8a, secondary #38bdf8, accent #22c55e, background #f8fafc, text #0f172a
JSX components for all UI elements
Clean, beginner-friendly code style with comments

existing_features.title: Generate only frontend code without backend implementation
Write all components using JSX format instead of TSX, ensuring readable and well-commented code suitable for beginners
Implement mock interview module as voice-based rather than text-based, with audio recording and playback capabilities
Create email-based OTP authentication with login and register pages, redirecting to dashboard after successful login using protected routes
Create dashboard layout with navbar, sidebar navigation, and main content area using plain CSS files (not Tailwind), with sidebar links for Dashboard, Resume, Roadmap, Quiz, and Progress pages
Create resume upload page with file input, upload button, success message display, and resume analysis result placeholder section
Create job role roadmap page where user enters job role and generates roadmap with topics, subtopics, and completion status (not started, in progress, completed), with progress saved in localStorage
Create topic quiz module where user enters topic, starts test with dummy questions, marks answers, and receives score
Create progress page showing roadmap completion percentage, number of quizzes taken, and last activity, fetching data from localStorage

Use the specified custom color palette consistently throughout the application: primary deep blue #1e3a8a, secondary sky blue #38bdf8, accent green #22c55e, background light gray #f8fafc, text dark slate #0f172a
Organize frontend with clean folder structure: components, pages, services, routes, context, and styles directories, with reusable navbar, sidebar, and API service files

new_feature_requests.summary: Email-based OTP authentication (login/register) with protected routes
Dashboard layout with navbar and sidebar navigation (CSS only)
Resume upload page with file input and success message
Job role roadmap generator with progress tracking (localStorage)
Topic quiz module with dummy questions and scoring
Progress page showing roadmap completion and quiz stats
